sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Service Catalog for Requesters">30464936dbb21300cca29b81ca9619c4</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Auto-populate Business Service in catalo</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Find the Blackberry service from cmdb_ci_service and populate it on the Business Service //Field also set the Business Service field readonly
   var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci_service');
	gr.addQuery('name','Blackberry');
	gr.query();
	if(gr.next()){
		//alert(gr.name);
		g_form.setValue('bsnsrvice',gr.sys_id);
		g_form.setReadOnly('bsnsrvice',true);
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-03 15:29:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9698b10adb831300cca29b81ca961962</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto-populate Business Service in catalo</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9698b10adb831300cca29b81ca961962</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-03 16:12:24</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Check the age of the variable age 
		if(newValue>30 || newValue<10)
		   g_form.showFieldMsg('age','Please enter an age between 10 to 30');
		else
			g_form.hideFieldMsg('age');
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-30 16:14:51</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6445628ddbc31300cca29b81ca9619f9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check age for Service catalog for req</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6445628ddbc31300cca29b81ca9619f9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-04 07:54:10</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

	// Add your code here
	    if (current.hasAttachments() == true)   
    {   
    gs.addInfoMessage('There is an attachment');   
    }   
    else   
    {   
    gs.addErrorMessage('There is no attachment. Please make an attachment relevant to the record.'); 
    current.setAbortAction(true);   
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-17 04:38:23</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b099cd7cdb761300cca29b81ca9619f4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Make Attachment Mandatory</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b099cd7cdb761300cca29b81ca9619f4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-17 04:46:19</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b099cd7cdb761300cca29b81ca9619f4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>ecc_agent</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Disable Pre-G Blocker BR</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	if (checkAllMidsUpgraded()) {
		var eccBrGr = new GlideRecord('sys_script');
		eccBrGr.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', ['2450c0003702120069da03488e41f1d5', '210c00803702120069da03488e41f1e4']);
		eccBrGr.setValue('active', false);
		eccBrGr.updateMultiple();
	}
})(current, previous);

function checkAllMidsUpgraded() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('ecc_agent');
	gr.query();
	while (gr.next())
		if (MIDServer.getByName(gr.name).isPreGeneva())
			return false;
	
	return true;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>will.swift</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-03-04 00:43:15</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>210c00803702120069da03488e41f1e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Disable Pre-G Blocker BR</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="MID Server" source="com.glideapp.agent">ab267b3314a11300651763392430a4a9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_210c00803702120069da03488e41f1e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-12 22:41:24</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=210c00803702120069da03488e41f1e4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_6a18a5c00a0a0bb80064cc226cc72296
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_db_object</collection><condition>current.super_class.changes()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Prevent Recursion</name><order>100</order><priority/><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[var rt = new RecursionTester('sys_db_object', 'super_class');
if (rt.isRecursive(current)) {
   current.setAbortAction(true);
   current.parent.setError('Invalid Parent');
   gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('The selected parent loops back to this record (recursive loop)'));
}

// Prevent duplicates
if (current.operation() == 'insert') {
   var dup = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
   dup.addQuery('name', current.name);
   dup.query();
   if (dup.hasNext()) {
      current.setAbortAction(true);
      current.name.setError(gs.getMessage('Table name {0} is already in use', current.name));
      gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Table name {0} is already in use', current.name));
   }
}

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2007-08-15 15:17:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6a18a5c00a0a0bb80064cc226cc72296</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Prevent Recursion</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">19633f3314211300651763392430a4ce</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6a18a5c00a0a0bb80064cc226cc72296</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-18 17:26:36</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6a18a5c00a0a0bb80064cc226cc72296"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_ddd2559ddbb65300cca29b81ca961923
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.getSubcatfromCat</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Retrieve Subcategories based on Category chosen</description><name>getSubcatfromCat</name><script><![CDATA[function getSubcatfromCat() {
       if (current.u_category == '') {

               //gs.log('business service is empty');

               return;

       }
		gs.log('Current category : '+current.u_category);
		var subct = '';
		var objRelCI = new GlideRecord('u_category_reference');
		objRelCI.addQuery('u_parent', current.u_category);

       objRelCI.query();
	
       while (objRelCI.next()) {
               if(subct.length>0)
				   subct+=(','+objRelCI.u_hardware_type).toString();
				else
				   subct=objRelCI.u_hardware_type.toString();
       }
		gs.log('Retrieved Subcategories: '+subct);
       return 'u_hardware_typeIN' + subct;

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-18 18:43:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>ddd2559ddbb65300cca29b81ca961923</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getSubcatfromCat</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ddd2559ddbb65300cca29b81ca961923</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-19 07:15:15</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Service Catalog for Requesters">30464936dbb21300cca29b81ca9619c4</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Make attachment mandatory for Ser Cat re</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   
	var cat_id = gel('sysparm_item_guid').value; 

	var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_attachment"); 

	gr.addQuery("table_name", "sc_cart_item"); 

	gr.addQuery("table_sys_id", cat_id); 

	gr.query(); 

	if (!gr.next()) { 

		alert("You must attach a file to submit."); 

		return false; 

	}   
	else{	
		 if(gr.getValue('file_name').indexOf('xlsx') != -1 && gr.getValue('file_name').indexOf('Sample Document') != -1){//meaning if you find a file with xls extension

}else{
	alert("Attachment must be of Xls format and name 'Sample Document'");	
return false;
	}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-30 16:23:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9938268ddbc31300cca29b81ca961926</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Make attachment mandatory for Ser Cat re</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9938268ddbc31300cca29b81ca961926</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-02 15:26:17</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_d92636b2975301008e00958e3b297567
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>login.failed</event_name><name>SNC User Lockout Check with Auto Unlock</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[//
// Check to see if the user has failed to login too many times
// when the limit is reached, lock the user out of the system.
// Also create a trigger to unlock the user after 'N' minutes.
//

lockoutOnFailedLogin();

function lockoutOnFailedLogin() {
	var maxUnlockAttempts = gs.getProperty("glide.user.max_unlock_attempts", 5);
	var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
	if (gr.get("user_name", event.parm1.toString())) {
		if (gr.failed_attempts > maxUnlockAttempts)
			return;

		gr.failed_attempts += 1;
		if (gr.failed_attempts > maxUnlockAttempts) {
			gr.locked_out = true;
			gr.update();
			gs.log("User " + event.parm1 + " locked out due to too many invalid login attempts");
			triggerUnlock(gr.sys_id);
		} else {
			gr.update();       
		}
	}
}

function triggerUnlock(userSysID) {
	var unlockIn = gs.getProperty("glide.user.unlock_timeout_in_mins", 15);
	var trigger = new GlideRecord("sys_trigger");
	trigger.name = "Unlock the user after "+ unlockIn + " mins";
	trigger.next_action = getTriggerTime(unlockIn);
	trigger.job_id.setDisplayValue('RunScriptJob');
	trigger.script = getTriggerScript(userSysID);
	trigger.document = 'sys_user';
	trigger.document_key = userSysID;
	trigger.state = 0;
	trigger.trigger_type = 0;
	trigger.insert();
}

function getTriggerScript(userSysID) {
	var ret = ""
	+ "var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');\n"
	+ "gr.addQuery('sys_id', '" +userSysID+ "');\n"
	+ "gr.addQuery('locked_out', true);\n"
	+ "gr.query();\n"
	+ "if (gr.next()) {\n"
		+ "gr.locked_out = false;\n"
		+ "gr.failed_attempts = 0;\n"
		+ "gr.update();\n"
		+ "gs.log('Auto-unlocking user '+gr.name);\n"
	+ "} else {\n"
		+ "gs.log('Unable to auto-unlock user with sys_id: "+userSysID+"');\n"
	+ "}";
	return ret;
}

function getTriggerTime(minutesToAdd) {
	var checkTime = new GlideDateTime(/*now*/);
	checkTime.addSeconds(minutesToAdd * 60);
	return checkTime;
}
]]></script><synchronous>true</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-08-24 00:27:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d92636b2975301008e00958e3b297567</sys_id><sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNC User Lockout Check with Auto Unlock</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="High Security Settings" source="com.glide.high_security">e8c6bb7714a11300651763392430a423</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_d92636b2975301008e00958e3b297567</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>developer.program@snc</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-12 23:12:25</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_bd83b819db765300cca29b81ca9619ae
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.getCIbasedonBusinessservice</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>When the business service is set to x, the configuration item field should show only those ci's that are related to x. </description><name>getCIbasedonBusinessservice</name><script><![CDATA[function getCIbasedonBusinessservice() {

       if (current.business_service == '') {

               //gs.log('business service is empty');

               return;

       }

		gs.log('business service : '+ current.business_service);
		var objRelCI = new GlideRecord('cmdb_rel_ci');
		objRelCI.addQuery('parent', current.business_service);

       objRelCI.query();

       var retval = "sys_idIN";

       // ADD DOWNSTREAM

       while (objRelCI.next()) {

               //gs.log('child.sys_class_name = ' + objRelCI.child.sys_class_name);

               //gs.log('child string = ' + objRelCI.child.toString());

               //if(objRelCI.child.sys_class_name != "cmdb_ci_service")

                       retval += objRelCI.child.sys_id.toString() + ",";

       }
		gs.log('Final Result = ' + retval);
       return retval;

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-18 16:18:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>bd83b819db765300cca29b81ca9619ae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getCIbasedonBusinessservice</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_bd83b819db765300cca29b81ca9619ae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-19 03:59:37</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Service Catalog for Requesters">30464936dbb21300cca29b81ca9619c4</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Validate age on custom catalog</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   //Validate age 
	var age = g_form.getValue('age');
	if (age === '')
		return true;
	if(isNaN(age)){
		alert('Age given should be a number within 10 to 30 years');
		return false;
	}
	else{
		if (age<10 || age>30){
			alert('Age should be within 10 to 30');
			return false;
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-04 07:13:23</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9820d99edb031300cca29b81ca96195a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate age on custom catalog</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9820d99edb031300cca29b81ca96195a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-04 07:27:08</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_2450c0003702120069da03488e41f1d5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>ecc_queue</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Pre-G MID Upgrade ECC Blocker</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var query = current.getEncodedQuery();
	if (query.indexOf('agent') != -1) {
		var agent = '';
		var queryArr = query.split('^');
		for (var i = 0; i < queryArr.length; i++)
			if (queryArr[i].indexOf('agent') != -1)
				agent = queryArr[i].split('=')[1];
		
		var mid = MIDServer.getByName(agent);

		if (mid && mid.isPreGeneva())
			current.addQuery('topic', 'IN', ['SystemCommand', 'HeartbeatProbe']);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>will.swift</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-03-03 23:49:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2450c0003702120069da03488e41f1d5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Pre-G MID Upgrade ECC Blocker</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="MID Server" source="com.glideapp.agent">ab267b3314a11300651763392430a4a9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2450c0003702120069da03488e41f1d5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-12 22:41:24</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2450c0003702120069da03488e41f1d5"/></record_update>
